sentences.sentence: "It was incredible," Kurt says, suddenly aglow.
sentences.translation: “简直是令人难以置信，”库尔特突然容光焕发地说到。

sentences.sentence: The night skies will be aglow with fireworks.
When I arrive, the sun has just begun to dip below the horizon, so I drop my bags at my cabin and race toward an apparent mirage of red and orange peaks, aglow in the late afternoon light.
sentences.translation: 当我到达的时候，太阳刚刚开始沉入地平线以下，所以我把旅行袋扔在座舱里，然后跑向在傍晚的余晖里清楚可见的红橙色相间的沙峰的蜃景。
